Articles.Content: I bought ksp on promotion recently, and i've been following the game for a long time but my pc didnt had the specs to play the game so i bought it on ps4, but i just realized that the console version is like, 1 or 2 years behind the pc version, will the game ever get some new update? Because i really love the game and would be really sad if it ended up like that.

On 4/24/2020 at 11:36 PM, ZenKerman said:

I bought ksp on promotion recently, and i've been following the game for a long time but my pc didnt had the specs to play the game so i bought it on ps4, but i just realized that the console version is like, 1 or 2 years behind the pc version, will the game ever get some new update? Because i really love the game and would be really sad if it ended up like that.

last time I checked the console version is in 1.7. It probably will be updated in a few months, or never because ksp 2.
